hiveArticle.title: ðŸ’° I will give you 3 Steem Dollar just for resteeming and upvoting ! ( MY OTHER POSTS ALSO NOT JUST THIS ONE ) !
hiveArticle.body:
I have been on steemit for more than 2 months and I've earned almost $100 and withdrew them. But lately I don't earn so much, that's why I don't care about money and I will give some of my earning to random people that upvote and resteem my posts. And I will not stop doing that till I get at least $5 or more from each post I will write. So I want to giveaway $3 STEEM DOLLARS to 100 people: $0.03 for each random one who will upvote and resteem this post or any posts I created.

http://imgh.us/U5dqzZjV1jft7ExMT6HMMMzsUCfa949_1680x8400.jpg

If you don't know how to resteem check it here : [HOW TO RESTEEM ON STEEMIT ? ðŸ’¡](https://steemit.com/steemit/@clixmoney/how-to-resteem-on-steemit)

When I send money I will share it in each post I write, with proofs and I will write your logins and advertise them in my next posts.

http://imgh.us/vector_9.png

Keep following @Clixmoney . 

---------------------------------------------------

[Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/clixmoney) - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bsadel333) - [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/cnycik) - [GOLOS](https://golos.io/@cryptoearner) - [FACEBOOK GROUP -RESTEEM TO BE RESTEEMED](https://www.facebook.com/groups/clixmoney)

---------------------------------------------------

It continues, I still send $0.03 SBD to random people who will upvote and resteem my new posts.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
More I will earn more I will give ! Spread the news and everyone will be happy â˜º.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

If someone is looking for proofs go to my page at @Clixmoney and go to my wallet and you will see that I am always sending people steem dollar like I promise !

**Go ahead, upvote and resteem and receive your prize !**

http://imgh.us/0_40.gif
